title: Malware turns hundreds of security cameras into a botnet
text:
Malware turns hundreds of security cameras into a botnet 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
Closed-circuit security cameras are supposed to make you safer, but some malware is turning them into weapons. Researchers at Incapsula have... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
